plot outline: Watch the full movie, Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara, only on Eros Now. Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara is a 1988 Indian Kannada film, directed by Rajachandra and produced by Anuradha Singh, Dushyanth Singh and Amratha Singh. The film stars Ambarish, Anant Nag and Tulasi in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijayanand.
